scripts.local:clean: docker compose -f src/docker/local-mysql-db.yml down -v && rm -rf src/docker/.mysql_data
scripts.local:restart: pnpm run local:stop && pnpm run local:start
scripts.local:clean:restart: pnpm run local:stop && pnpm run local:clean && pnpm run local:start
scripts.migrate:dev: sst bind -- pnpm exec prisma migrate dev
scripts.migrate:deploy: sst bind -- pnpm exec prisma migrate deploy
scripts.studio: sst bind -- pnpm exec prisma studio
